name: Kelvin Cody
description: I am a genuine,loyal,kind and sincere person with a good sense of humor. I would like to meet someone who is like minded and willing to have fun. I love traveling and have traveled extensively.I like walking in the countryside and by the sea. I work part time in a local community hospital. I enjoy working in my garden, cooking, crafts and the out of doors.Like to watch sports. Look forward to hearing from a woman with similar interests and personality. Also like cosy nights in with a bottle of wine and to cuddle up on the sofa. Enjoy entertaining as well. I have been on my own for quite a few years now and would like to share it with another person.
